synopsis.text: Mikogami sisters, Riko, Rimu, and Nagisa, are a trio of lively girls living in Kamiha City, where they spend their days engrossed in animal research and cosplaying as their favorite creatures. Their ordinary lives take a magical turn when they stumble upon enigmatic devices called 'Kirumin compacts' in their attic, which enable them to physically transform into real animals. As the girls embark on a series of adorable, amusing, and occasionally perilous escapades, they form a detective club to help people and combat mysterious foreign adversaries who seem to have a sinister interest in their newfound abilities. This heartwarming comedy follows the Mikogami sisters as they navigate through their transformed lives, ensuring laughter, excitement, and a touch of mystery at every turn.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
